GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Fetches an array of all articles, sorted by creation date in descending order. Each article includes a count of associated comments.

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
articles.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Fetches a single article by its ID.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Fetches an array of comments for the specified article ID. Comments are sorted by creation date in descending order.
